alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Eastern Louisa; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond); Western King William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:46PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Louisa, central Goochland, southwestern Caroline and Hanover Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ladysmith to near Gum Spring. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ashland, Oilville and Kings Dominion around 820 PM EDT. Dawn around 825 PM EDT. Hanover, Sabot and Mangohick around 830 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Chilesburg, Orchid, Golansville, Crozier, Vontay, Gum Tree, Johnsons Springs, Elmont, Gilman and Cedar Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central, north central and east central Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Eastern Louisa; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond); Western King William
